item.title: All aboard
item.description: Fleep is the new tinder for data scientists. After some online speed dataing a team was born. I showed my wife a list of names we’d come up with. The result of the vote is at the end of this post. Sorry Fleep, once we got serious it was time for Slack where we set up a channel called let’s do for voting using emojis. It’s a good way to keep trigger happy channel creators under control ðŸ˜Š.

item.title: Window seat
item.description: It’s a lot easier driving when you’re looking out the windscreen to see where you’re going. Two members of the Mathemagicians had previous experience and their advice was our windscreen. Data ingestion was a challenge The main recurring theme of the best team projects was that they found a clear and coherent problem to solve and they focused on it I canâ€™t emphasise enough how important research into the industry is
